subject: Re: [R] data in serial port... how to read
body:
On 09-Apr-07 16:29:20, Cleber Borges wrote:
> Hello all
> 
> 
> Is there a package for reading data in serial port
> ("COM1" in windows)?
> 
> Is there a simple way for make this?
> 
> thanks for any tips!
> 
> 
> Cleber Borges

There was a thread "[R] Reading data from a serial port"
starting on 13 September 2005 about this. You may find the
information there sufficient for your needs.

You will need to read the whole thread (5 messages) -- the full
information did not emerge all at once!

To find it, go to

https://stat.ethz.ch/pipermail/r-help/2005-September/thread.html

and scroll down until you find it.

Hoping this helps -- if not sufficient, please ask more questions.

Best wishes,
Ted.

PLEASE do read the posting guide http://www.R-project.org/posting-guide.html
and provide commented, minimal, self-contained, reproducible code.
